reviewText: I rate this film as average. Even though it illustrates Mrquez main points from the novel, it was missing the magic we are used to when reading Garca Mrquez.
I was recommended this DVD by an elderly Mexican gentleman.  It did not disappoint.
It was an awesome movie. The cast was great, the movie followed the book very close. The ending was great.
This film is based on the last novel written by Gabriel Garcia Marquez.  I love the book and liked the film.
